name: Save the Sun (beckhaywood)
description:
The sun has run out of fuel and is on the brink of mass destruction! Only you can extend the sun’s lifetime by sacrificing the near by planets to the fiery body. However, not everyone everyone is okay with losing their planet…

Credit to: Mark(Art), Beck, Edward(Dev), and Dzidzor(Musician).

PS: My record is 112 months, try to beat it :)
